members.name: SpeechSynthesisEvent.charIndex
members.description: Returns the index position of the character in the SpeechSynthesisUtterance.text that was being spoken when the event was triggered.

members.name: SpeechSynthesisEvent.elapsedTime
members.description: Returns the elapsed time in milliseconds after theÂ SpeechSynthesisUtterance.text started being spoken that the event was triggered at.

members.name: SpeechSynthesisEvent.name
members.description: Returns the name associated with certain types of events occuring as the SpeechSynthesisUtterance.text is being spoken: the name of the SSML marker reached in the case of a mark event, or the type of boundary reached in the case of a boundary event.

members.name: SpeechSynthesisEvent.utterance
members.description: Returns the SpeechSynthesisUtterance instance that the event was triggered on.
